nodes.text: Kreigg was a Human male commander in the Galactic Empire who served as a tactical advisor during the early years of the Galactic Civil War. A loyal Imperial soldier, Kreigg earned Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin's favor for his cunning during a Rebel attack on the Moff's flagship. Kreigg had brown hair and light-colored skin.
Commander Kreigg first appeared on a card for the Premiere set of Decipher's 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
